description:
To Law and the others’ surprise, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats attack the giant torii gate in front of Onigashima. Meanwhile, Kaido and Orochi are having a big banquet on the island where Kaido’s formidable subordinates are also called in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaido`s Trump Card! The Tobi Roppo Appear!
Kaidos Trumpf – Auftritt der Sechs Überflieger!
Kaidou no Kirifuda: Tobi Roppou Toujou
L’atout de Kaido ! Les Tobi Roppo entrent en scène
¡La furia de Kaido! ¡El poder de los Numbers!
Козырная карта Кайдо! Появление Летающей Шестёрки!
ورقة كايدو الرّابحة، ظهور التّوبي روبّو!
カイドウの切り札 飛び六胞登場
